00009 #import "IMSRGravityTestCases.h"
00010 #import "IMSRGravity.h"
00011 
00012 @implementation IMSRGravityTestCases
00013 
00014 - (void)testCreateIMSRGravity
00015 {
00016         IMSRGravity *gravity    = [[IMSRGravity alloc] init];
00017         
00018         STAssertNotNil(gravity, @"IMSRGravity not created");
00019         NSString *selectedBody  = [gravity selectedBody];
00020         NSString *expectedBody = @"Earth";
00021         STAssertEqualObjects(selectedBody, expectedBody, @"Expected %@ selected. %@ actually selected",
00022                                                  expectedBody, selectedBody);
00023         
00024         NSDictionary *body                      = [gravity bodyGravity];
00025         STAssertNotNil(gravity.bodyGravity, @"Gravity NSDictionary not available");
00026         STAssertTrue(body.count == 3, @"Incorrect number of elements in bodyGravity");
00027         
00028         NSNumber *result                        = [body valueForKey: @"Earth"];
00029         NSNumber *expectedResultE       = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -9.81];
00030         STAssertTrue([result isEqualToNumber: expectedResultE], @"Incorrect gravity value for Earth: %@", result);
00031         
00032         result                                          = [body valueForKey: @"Moon"];
00033         NSNumber *expectedResultM       = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -1.624];
00034         STAssertTrue([result isEqualToNumber: expectedResultM], @"Incorrect gravity value for Moon: %@", result);
00035         
00036         result                                          = [body valueForKey: @"Jupiter"];
00037         NSNumber *expectedResultJ       = [NSNumber numberWithDouble: -24.8];
00038         STAssertTrue([result isEqualToNumber: expectedResultJ], @"Incorrect gravity value for Jupiter: %@", result);
00039         
00040         [body release];
00041         [gravity release];
00042 }
00043 
00044 - (void)testCreateIMSRGRavityWithBody
00045 {
00046         NSString        *expectedResult = @"Moon";
00047         IMSRGravity *gravity            = [[IMSRGravity alloc] initWithBody: expectedResult];
00048         STAssertNotNil(gravity, @"IMSRGravity not created with Moon");
00049         
00050         NSString        *result                 = [gravity selectedBody];
00051         STAssertEqualObjects(result, expectedResult, @"Expected %@. Got %@", expectedResult, result);
00052         
00053         [expectedResult release];
00054         [gravity release];
00055 }
00056 
00057 - (void)testGetGravityForSelectedBody
00058 {
00059         NSString        *body                   = @"Jupiter";
00060         IMSRGravity     *gravity                = [[IMSRGravity alloc] initWithBody: body];
00061         STAssertNotNil(gravity, @"IMSRGravity not created with Jupiter");
00062         
00063         double          expectedResult  = -24.8;        // Gravity of Jupiter, m/s
00064         double          result                  = [gravity gravityForSelectedBody];
00065         STAssertEquals(result, expectedResult, @"Expected %f, got %f", expectedResult, result);
00066 }
00067 
00068 @end
